summary.Briefly describe your professional backg: I am a highly motivated BCA student with strong skills in web development, especially React.js and frontend design. I have hands-on experience building real-world applications, including a food delivery app and a digital menu system for cafés. I am currently learning full-stack development and AI integration to build intelligent systems. My career objective is to become a successful tech entrepreneur by creating scalable digital products that solve real-life problems.
